Pre-Game Insights: Andy Flower predicts that the young Indian team will fare well against Zimbabwe in the T20I series.
Andy Flower is excited to see how the budding team will fare and thinks it will be fascinating to watch.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Andy Flower praises Jasprit Bumrah, saying he is a different gravy and a class apart from all the other seamers in world cricket.
Others: Andy Flower thinks Rahul Dravid did not continue as the Indian coach because he has been on the road for a while and also worked at the NCA for a number of years.
